data.title: Love & Devotion
data.meta_description: Love & Devotion brings together two of Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan’s finest recordings, 1992’s Love Songs and Devotional Songs. They are perfect companion pieces, snapshots of a musical giant at the very height of his considerable powers, whilst the artistry of his accompanying Party is also faultless.
data.text:
The Musicians:

Majahid Mubarak Ali Khan: Nusrat’s cousin and senior member of the group

Farakh Fateh Ali Khan: Nusrat’s younger brother, Lead Singer and Harmonium Player

Mohammed Iqbal Naqbi: Chorus Singer, Secretary of the group

Maqsood Hussain: Lead Singer

Rahmat Ali: 2nd Harmonium Player

Asad Ali: Chorus Singer

Dildar Hussain: Tabla Player

Ghulam Fareed: Chorus Singer

Kaukab Ali: Chorus Singer

Rahat Ali: Pupil Singer, 10 years old

Majawar Abbas: Mandolin, Guitar

All songs written and arranged by Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan

Except Ni Main Jogi De Naal lyrics by Baba Bulla Shah

Recorded at Fair Deal Studios, Middlesex

Engineered by Bari Watts

A Real World Design by Marc Bessant

Front cover ‘Pro-Tem (Still Rains and Reigns)’ by Russell Mills © 1990

This panel ‘In Gathering Trance’ by Russell Mills © 1990

Left hand panel ‘ Swoop: Antenna’ by Russell Mills © 1988

Photographed by David Buckland

Photography of Nusrat and Party by Ishida Masataka

Special thanks to Mohammed Ayyub at Oriental Star Agencies Ltd
